content: I wouldn't be opposed to replacing the playground's usage of hubcaps with something more actively maintained, but it looks like gists aren't supported yet?
I do see the HTTP escape hatch section.

From my experience adding support for different endpoints in bors-rs (which has a github client similar to octocrab), it probably wouldn't take more than an afternoon or two to add support for gists depending on how complex the types for that endpoint are
If someone doesn't beat me I'll add gists sometime this week.
